DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the early metabolic responses (whole body and within muscle tissue) to a single day of whole body physical inactivity (i.e. bed-rest), and evaluate the contribution of inactivity per se vs alterations in diet
DOC.brief_title: Bed Rest, Inactivity and Early Responses
DOC.criteria: Healthy and aged 1840 y BMI between 18 and 30 On medication Family history of metabolic disease Diagnosed with any metabolic or cardiovascular conditions BMI < 18 or > 30
